TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CryptoStream extends System.IO.Stream implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 定义将数据流链接到加密转换的流。

span.span: Defines a stream that links data streams to cryptographic transformations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时使用面向流的设计进行加密。The common language runtime uses a stream-oriented design for cryptography. 这种设计的核心是。The core of this design is . 任何加密对象实现可以实现的任何对象以及链接，因此可以需要一个对象的流式处理的输出传递给另一个对象的输入。Any cryptographic objects that implement can be chained together with any objects that implement , so the streamed output from one object can be fed into the input of another object. 中间结果 （从第一个对象的输出） 不需要单独存储。The intermediate result (the output from the first object) does not need to be stored separately. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在完成使用类型后，您应释放它的直接或间接通过调用其方法，后者反过来调用其实现。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly by calling its method, which in turn calls its implementation. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 你应始终显式关闭你对象都完成后使用通过调用方法。You should always explicitly close your object after you are done using it by calling the method. 这样刷新基础流，并使所有剩余数据的处理块对象。Doing so flushes the underlying stream and causes all remaining blocks of data to be processed by the object. 但是，如果你在调用之前，则会发生异常方法，对象可能不会关闭。However, if an exception occurs before you call the method, the object might not be closed. 若要确保始终调用方法，请将放到调用方法内的`finally`块`try` / `catch`语句。To ensure that the method always gets called, place your call to the method within the `finally` block of a `try`/`catch` statement. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用加密字符串。The following example demonstrates how to use a to encrypt a string. 此方法使用使用指定的类和初始化向量 ()。This method uses class with the specified and initialization vector (). [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/cs/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/vb/fileexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会包装类型的调用实现。This method wraps a call to the type's implementation. 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();

summary.span: 清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刷新流将不会刷新其基础的编码器，除非你明确地调用或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但不是会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8 和 UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 你应通过调用方法或方法以完成刷新缓冲区。You should call either the method or the method to complete flushing the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ FlushAsync(System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 异步清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备，并且监控取消请求。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream asynchronously, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在调用之前添加与`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic 中) 运算符可暂停执行方法，直到完成该任务为止。You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含值属性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

span.span: The stream has been disposed.

public: void FlushFinalBlock();

summary.span: 用缓冲区的当前状态更新基础数据源或存储库，随后清除缓冲区。

span.span: Updates the underlying data source or repository with the current state of the buffer, then clears the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法将调用。Calling the method will call . 如果不调用，调用完成刷新缓冲区。If you do not call , call to complete flushing the buffer. 调用流的所有活动都时才完成。Call only when all stream activity is complete.

exception.span: 密钥已损坏，它可能会导致流的填充无效。

span.span: The key is corrupt which can cause invalid padding to the stream.
The current stream is not writable.
-or-
The final block has already been transformed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteAsync (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ WriteAsync(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 从中写入数据的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer to write data from.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中的从零开始的字节偏移量，从此位置开始将字节写入到流。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer from which to begin writing bytes to the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 最多写入的字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 将字节序列异步写入当前流，将该流的当前位置向前移动写入的字节数，并监视取消请求。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream asynchronously, advances the current position within the stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在调用之前添加与`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic 中) 运算符可暂停执行方法，直到完成该任务为止。You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含值属性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

span.span: is .
or is negative.

exception.span: 和 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The stream does not support writing.
The stream has been disposed.

exception.span: 流正在由前一次写操作使用。

span.span: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
